Author: MissNietzsche
Text: Lol yeppppp. I've mostly given up purging too, so it's very heart-breaking.  I just hate dreaming about bingeing tbh. Because I feel the same sense of regret that I do irl. But then I wake up and I'm glad it wasn't real..so maybe it's a good thing because it's acting out urges without the Calories, and showing me how I regret it ðŸ˜¹

Author: jakisaur
Text: yesssss they are the hecking worst, especially bc I usually have a hard time purging in my dreams. but in last night's wonderful dream I could not purge. AT. ALL. it was a freaking nightmare u g h.  also there was this guy I thought I was over who broke up with his gf in my dream and I tried to get with him. tho I did leave him to go b/p so at least my dreamself still has her senses.
